description:
A former White Base crew member during the One Year War, who was better known for his cynicism and sarcasm than for his prowess as a Guncannon pilot. Kai has grown up into a flamboyant freelance journalist, whose globe-trotting exploits give him ample opportunity to gather intelligence for the Karaba resistance group, and whose keen perceptions allow him to see right through Char Aznable`s "Quattro Bajeena" guise.
Source: Official Site
name: Kai Shiden
